title: How to Make Gluten Free Vegan Cookies

steps.headline: Oil a large baking sheet lightly while you preheat the oven to 350ºF/180ºC.
Mix the rice flour mix, xanthan gum, baking powder, salt, and cinnamon together in a medium bowl.
Combine the butter or shortening and sugar in a separate bowl.
Mix the soy milk and vanilla into the butter mixture.
Combine the wet ingredients with the dry ones.
steps.description: Add nuts, chocolate chips, raisins, dried fruit, or anything else.

steps.headline: Roll into quarter-sized balls and place on a cookie sheet.
Flatten with the fingers and sprinkle the tops with sugar.
Bake them for 5 minutes, rotate the pan, and then bake another 4 minutes.

text: Oil a large baking sheet lightly while you preheat the oven to 350ºF/180ºC.  Mix the rice flour mix, xanthan gum, baking powder, salt, and cinnamon together in a medium bowl.  Combine the butter or shortening and sugar in a separate bowl.  Mix the soy milk and vanilla into the butter mixture.  Combine the wet ingredients with the dry ones. Add nuts, chocolate chips, raisins, dried fruit, or anything else. Roll into quarter-sized balls and place on a cookie sheet.  Flatten with the fingers and sprinkle the tops with sugar.  Bake them for 5 minutes, rotate the pan, and then bake another 4 minutes.
